biotools.summary: flexiMAP (flexible Modeling of Alternative PolyAdenylation) is a regression-based method for discovering differential alternative polyadenylation events in standard RNA-seq data. It is a beta-regression-based method implemented in R, for discovering differential alternative polyadenylation events in standard RNA-seq data. Importantly, flexiMAP allows the modeling of multiple known covariates that often confound the results of RNA-seq data analysis.
